resources.string: There are no commands in corpus.

This application is used to record a corpus of commands, which will be used to pilot a drone. The commands are recorded in *wav format. The app also allows the user to test the vocal recognition, on the recorded corpus.
This application was developped for a project made during a Master IHM at Paul Sabatier University, by Julien Soula, Benjamin Saint-Sever, Safwan Al Masri, Paul Givel.
